com.team1389.motion_profile

Class MotionProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1389.motion_profile.MotionProfile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CombinedProfile, ConstantAccelProfile

    public abstract class MotionProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the theoretical path of a particle (or robot). At every time, the position, velocity, and acceleration are well defined.

      • getPosition

        public final double getPosition(double time)
        Parameters:
        time - Time to get position at, should be less than or equal to duration, however behavior is well defined if this is not the case
        Returns:
        Position at the requested time, the position at the end if time > duration

      • getVelocity

        public final double getVelocity(double time)
        Parameters:
        time - Time to get velocity at, should be less than or equal toduration, however behavior is well defined if this is not the case
        Returns:
        Velocity at the requested time, 0 if time > duration

      • getAcceleration

        public final double getAcceleration(double time)
        Parameters:
        time - Time to get velocity at, should be less than or equal to duration, however behavior is well defined if this is not the case
        Returns:
        Velocity at the requested time, 0 if time > duration

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished(double time)
        Parameters:
        time - A time (greater than 0) to check if the motion is finished at
        Returns:
        True if time is greater than duration, false otherwise
